channel.title: 2.0 Help - compile error
channel.description:
Hi Guys,
After watching my racked Axoloti sitting on shelf for almost a year, today, I gave it a go to use it as a send effect on my mixer. Check the the actual status of the software, downloaded version 2 and now, I am unable to turn the unit into a live mode :
Link to firmware CRC CDEEEFDA Axoloti version : 2.0.0-0-g88b60feb build time : 18/12/2019 01:56:25 GMT Status: factory (2.0.0,anon) : OK ( 2.0.0,clean ) Status : home : OK Status: community (2.0.0,anon) : OK ( 2.0.0,clean ) Status : Runtime : OK USB device found connected Authentic Axoloti Core /bin/sh: arm-none-eabi-g++: command not found error: compiler arm-none-eabi-g++ not found in path=/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/platform_osx/bin:/Applications/gcc-arm-none-eabi-7-2018-q2-update/bin:/bin:, not installed? Please download and install GNU Arm Embedded Toolchain 7-2018-q2-update from https://armkeil.blob.core.windows.net/developer/Files/downloads/gnu-rm/7-2018q2/gcc-arm-none-eabi-7-2018-q2-update-mac.tar.bz2 /Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/env/test-env.mk:25: *** Compiler not found. Stop. and extract to /Applications/ search path : /Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/axoloti-factory/objects Firmware version: 2.0.0.0, crc=0xCDEEEFDA search path : /Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/objects search path : /Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/axoloti-contrib/objects search path : /Applications/axoloti_runtime/objects finished loading objects Generate code complete compiling /Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/build/xpatch.cpp /bin/sh: arm-none-eabi-g++: command not found make: *** [/Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/build/xpatch.o] Error 127 Compiling patch failed
What I'm doing wrong?

item.title: 2.0 Help - compile error
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

Yes, 2.0 isn't ready yet. BUT the cause of the problem in the original post is that the gcc toolchain isn't installed, or not installed correctly..

Read full topic

item.title: 2.0 Help - compile error
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Version 2 is "still in development".

Save yourself a lot of headache and just install last stable release.

Read full topic

item.title: 2.0 Help - compile error
item.dc:creator: @snaper snaper
item.description:
@snaper wrote:

Hi Guys,

After watching my racked Axoloti sitting on shelf for almost a year, today, I gave it a go to use it as a send effect on my mixer.
Check the the actual status of the software, downloaded version 2 and now, I am unable to turn the unit into a live mode :

Link to firmware CRC CDEEEFDA
Axoloti version : 2.0.0-0-g88b60feb build time : 18/12/2019 01:56:25 GMT
Status: factory (2.0.0,anon) : OK ( 2.0.0,clean )
Status : home : OK
Status: community (2.0.0,anon) : OK ( 2.0.0,clean )

connected
Authentic Axoloti Core
/bin/sh: arm-none-eabi-g++: command not found
error: compiler arm-none-eabi-g++ not found in path=/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/platform_osx/bin:/Applications/gcc-arm-none-eabi-7-2018-q2-update/bin:/bin:, not installed?

from https://armkeil.blob.core.windows.net/developer/Files/downloads/gnu-rm/7-2018q2/gcc-arm-none-eabi-7-2018-q2-update-mac.tar.bz2
/Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/env/test-env.mk:25: *** Compiler not found. Stop.
and extract to /Applications/
search path : /Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/axoloti-factory/objects
Firmware version: 2.0.0.0, crc=0xCDEEEFDA
search path : /Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/objects

search path : /Applications/axoloti_runtime/objects
finished loading objects

compiling /Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/build/xpatch.cpp

make: *** [/Volumes/fusion/Documents/axoloti-2.0.0/build/xpatch.o] Error 127
Compiling patch failed

What I'm doing wrong?
